name: Space Chad
description:
Welcome to SpaceChad, our team’s contribution to the “Infinity” Themed SAE Game Jam.

Alien traveler Antin T’Snok and his trusty spaceship ANN-MAR-3 are on collision course. Too close to earth, his path past this forsaken planet is quite literally rocky - asteroids, space junk and human satellites alike litter his path home. To make things worse, the device he’s carrying is fragile and may very well break upon impact with obstacles, which would inevitably suck him into a black hole, never to be seen again. Will you help Antin survive his dilemma?

CREDITS:

Artists:
Annemarie Ollendorf
Alina Rößner
Lara Teegen
Anou Lange

Programmer:
Konstantin Schubert
Kevin Holst

Music & Sounds:
Paul Gleitsmann
